savvi is a package for Safe Anytime Valid Inference [@ramdas2023gametheoretic].
Also, it's a savvy pun.

## Install

```shell
pip install git+https://github.com/assuncaolfi/savvi
```

For development, use [pdm](https://github.com/pdm-project/pdm).
